Name: Cognizer
About the game: Cognizer A new puzzle game of wits and recognition. Features: • Unique brain-challenge with symbols and colors • Entirely free, no locked features • Modes offered with and without time limits for all skill levels • The ambient sounds of Ohrwert heighten gameplay with high-quality Dub Techno • Sound effect banks tailored for each background music track • Colorblindness options
